'''Yicheng''' is a member of the [[Millelith]]. He can be found on patrol in Feiyun Slope, [[Liyue Harbor]].

==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Yicheng is a member of the Millelith. Due to unknown circumstances, he is always hungry; he had visited [[Bubu Pharmacy]] believing that he had an eating disorder, but the doctor told him that he was just extremely hungry.
